gen:link.msg:message: `EmployeeBenefitsExpensesExcludingExternalEmployees` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesExcludingExternalEmployees')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesExcludingExternalEmployees return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesExcludingExternalEmployeesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesExcludingExternalEmployeesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesExcludingExternalEmployeesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesExcludingExternalEmployeesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EmployeeBenefitsExpenses` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EmployeeBenefitsExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EmployeeBenefitsExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PensionCosts` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_PensionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_PensionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfPensionCostsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfPensionCostsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfPensionCostsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfPensionCostsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
